name: Kill Tally Combat SKin 101
description:
Can you control a Symbiotic Space Suit? Try this shashKing KeyBoard ONLY game!

HOW TO PLAY:

- change the direction of the symbiotic spacesuit by pressing the right button

- Touch the blue levers (once) to activate the platforms

- reach the highest platform

- simple...or is it? 

======

Music and art took too much time therefore: the Screen freezes after intro so hang on for 4 seconds... 

The correct game version is downloadable as my backup. The web browser version has some bugs to iron out.
